CSI API ETABS v1

cDetailingGetOneDetailedSlab_OneDetailingOutput_StripInfo Method

Represents the detailed rebars in one rebar strip of the slab, as defined in ETABS

Parameters

DetailingOutputIndex
Type: SystemInt32
Detailing Output Index
StripIndex
Type: SystemInt32
Strip Index
Name
Type: SystemString
Strip Name, as defined in ETABS
LayerName
Type: SystemString
Layer Name, as defined in ETABS
StripType
Type: SystemString
Type of Design Strip, as defined in ETABS - Column, Middle, None
NumberRegions
Type: SystemInt32
Regions of Rebars in the Design Strip. Generated by CSiDetail based on strip geometry and slab geometry

Return Value

Type: Int32
Returns zero if the function is successful; otherwise it returns a nonzero value.
